snippet: Arrieta allowed two hits in seven shutout innings, as the Cubs made it seven victories in eight games.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Chicago Cubs beat Pittsburgh Pirates, 7-1; other pro baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Arrieta allowed two hits in seven shutout innings, as the Cubs made it seven victories in eight games.

headline.print_headline: Cubs’ Arrieta Moves to 6-0, Shackling the Pirates Again
headline.main: Cubs’ Jake Arrieta Moves to 6-0, Shackling the Pirates Again
